title: New User Registration with Email and Password

description: As a prospective professional, I want to create a new account using my email address and a secure password, so that I can gain access to the platform and start building my professional network.

title: Receive Email Verification after Registration

title: Verify Account via Email Link

title: Notify User of Already Registered Email During Registration
